thread.title: #RaiseYourIQ
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by #RaiseYourIQ

author: #RaiseYourIQ
title: #RaiseYourIQ
text: I bought the Davinci IQ through POTV and the transaction has been pleasant. Ordered it and was surprised at how fast it got to me! When i opened the box I was happy to see that everything I had purchased was in the box plus a few extras POTV was awesome enough to throw in with the buy! Thanks for everything!
